comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: This looks like Belem - would anyone agree?

comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: ....or maybe a little nearer to Lisbon - I can't remember exactly where that large building with the tall chimneys is, that you can see in the right hand background of this photograph?

comment.author: 70107824@N00
comment._content: Yes. It's in Belém. The old power plant is called Central Tejo

comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: Thank you!  I have only been to this area once, last Summer; we took one trip by tram from Praca do Comercio to Belem and back, and one trip on the Cascais railway line from Cais do Sodre to Cascais and back, so I only have my recollections from those two trips (plus looking at lots of pictures on flickr from the Gulbenkian Museum photostream and others), from which to work out the location pictured in any photograph!
